demographics.other: Peer wellness ambassador and undergraduate researcher

summaries.title: Integrating Mental Health Advocacy with STEM Identity
summaries.summaryText: Sarah described bridging mental health awareness into STEM culture through peer-led workshops.

summaries.title: Navigating Gender Bias in Research Environments
summaries.summaryText: She recounted experiences where her technical contributions were overlooked and strategies she used to assert confidence.

themes.title: Normalizing Mental Health Conversations in STEM
themes.description: Sarah’s work highlights the growing student-led shift toward wellness advocacy within rigorous majors.

quotes.quoteText: You can’t innovate if you’re burned out — STEM needs to start treating wellness as part of success.
quotes.context: Sarah connecting wellness and academic productivity.

areasForImprovement.title: Integrate Wellness Programming into STEM Curriculum
areasForImprovement.description: Develop optional workshops or credit modules linking mental health and STEM performance.
